entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sharbot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 10:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -7.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
